# --description-- Use an id selector to give the element with the id `back-wall` a `background-color` of `#8B4513`. # --hints-- You should use a `#back-wall` selector. ```js assert(new __helpers.CSSHelp(document).getStyle('#back-wall')); ``` Your `#back-wall` selector should have a `background-color` of `#8B4513`. ```js assert(new __helpers.CSSHelp(document).getStyle('#back-wall')?.backgroundColor === 'rgb(139, 69, 19)'); ``` # --seed-- ## --seed-contents-- ```html Picasso Painting
``` ```css body { background-color: rgb(184, 132, 46); } --fcc-editable-region-- --fcc-editable-region-- ```
